author: GamingBolt
description:
While Elden Ring Nightreign is a great way to bring a bit of roguelike action to the tried and tested FromSoftware formula, what has made it really special is its callbacks to past titles in the studio’s illustrious history. 

The Nightfarers each bring elements of titles like Bloodborne and Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice to the mix, alongside a slew of bosses that bring back many fond memories of their original appearances in past games. With all of these nostalgic additions being brought to the table, it’s puzzling that the studio hasn’t added any of the memorable weapons it has added in past titles to the mix. 

We take a look at ten weapons that could potentially make the cut if FromSoft decides to remedy the situation.
title: 10 FromSoftware Weapons We Would Love To See In Elden Ring Nightreign

author: GamingBolt
description:
Hideo Kojima is one of the most respected video game creators in the industry, and that legacy has been built on top of constant innovation - whether it’s Policenauts, Metal Gear Solid, or even the cancelled Silent Hill game. 

With this video, we will be comparing Death Stranding 2 and Metal Gear Solid 5 against each other in terms of story, characters, gameplay, and legacy in an effort to both understand the many differences and parallels that exists between these games.
title: Death Stranding 2 vs Metal Gear Solid 5 - Which Hideo Kojima Game Did It Better?
